message: When I open my eyes, we're back in Toue's white room. Mink is standing next to me.

We made it...
But that was almost too easy.
Were those memories all that was holding Mink prisoner?
I thought I caught a glimpse of something deeper...
Although I'm worried about Mink, I take a look around the room.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where's Toue? We have to go after him."

name: ミンク
message: "We have more important things to do."
He looks at me. His eyes gleam darkly.
